summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred for a shipment made on July 28, 2005, including transportation and handling fees, along with a summary of discounts applied.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx for Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 8, 2005, and pertains to shipping charges incurred by Jeffrey Epstein.
Total charges for the shipment amount to $70.20 after discounts.
The shipment was picked up on July 28, 2005, and involved a delivery to a location in Paris, France.
The invoice indicates a fuel surcharge and a base discount applied to the total charges.
There are multiple references to adjustments and reasons for potential invoice changes, indicating a structured billing process.
